summary: Water quality is stable but requires monitoring for pH and TDS levels.

insights.recommendation: Maintain pH between 6.5 and 7.5; consider adding pH-lowering agents if it continues to rise.
Monitor TDS levels; ensure they remain below 500 ppm for optimal plant growth.
Maintain temperature between 24°C and 28°C for tilapia health.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.034 / 7.014 / 7.088 (trend: down)
• TDS avg/min/max: 324.216 / 300.3 / 331.8 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 25.716 / 23.56 / 30.44 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
